article_title: Rumors Of The Obamacare Death Spiral Have Been Greatly Exaggerated

article_metadata.description: For a while last fall, it looked like the Obamacare health insurance exchanges were spinning towards a death spiral. Enrollment in the health insurance exchanges was not growing as rapidly as many people had hoped. United Healthcare, one of the nation’s largest insurers, announced that it intended to pull out [...]
article_metadata.author: Peter Ubel
